Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class GameManager extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
GameManager represent the main Controller class of the Game. It initializes the Game Model and executes all the actions on it.

    • initGame

      public void initGame()
      Method initGame calls all the sub-methods to properly initialize the Game Model, also regarding the expert game mode if present. The method is responsible also for sending the initial state of the Game to the clients.

    • performAction

      public void performAction(Performable action) throws InvalidPlayerException, RoundOwnerException, GameException
      Method performAction calls the underlying method on the RoundManager.
      Parameters:
      action - the Performable to be executed on the Game Model.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerException - if the action's player is not valid.
      RoundOwnerException - if the action's player is not the current round owner.
      GameException - if a generic error is thrown.
      See Also:
      • RoundManager.performAction(Performable)
      • Performable

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Method propertyChange notifies the controller listeners.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - A PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source and the property that has changed.

    • handleNewRoundOwnerOnDisconnect

      public void handleNewRoundOwnerOnDisconnect(String username)
      Method handleNewRoundOwnerOnDisconnect handles the disconnection of the current round owner,
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the disconnected round owner.
      See Also:
      • RoundManager.handleNewRoundOwnerOnDisconnect(String)
